```{r}
#####################################################################
# Summarize gam models and output model summaries
# use vet_gam_launcher to launch automatically
# Katie Welgan
#####################################################################

# Setup -------------------------------------------------------------
run_date <- '2019_09_12_17_11_54'

region_list <- c('dia_afr_horn', 'dia_cssa', 'dia_wssa', 'dia_name', 'dia_sssa',
                'dia_mcaca', 'dia_central_asia',
                'dia_se_asia', 'dia_malay','dia_mid_east', 'dia_essa')

library(mgcv)

```

```{r}
for (reg in region_list){

  print(reg)
  child_mod <- paste0('/share/geospatial/mbg/lri/has_lri/output/', run_date, '/child_model_list_', reg, '_0.RData')
  load(child_mod)
  gam <- child_models[['gam']]
  print(summary(gam))
  plot(gam)

}


```
